issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: Alloy

components.name: Titanium SDK & CLI
components.description: Please enter tickets related to the MobileSDK here.

fields.description:
If we create TableView in titanium, and add TableViewRow in it, and component of TextField in the Row.

then we cannot edit the TextField in the TableViewRow, i.e the TextField cannot be edited using the default keyboard provided by AndroidL.

this is a major bug and we had discussed earlier in the developer community but no one noticed it.

please someone see it as this is a major Issue.
fields.summary: Default Keyboard does not work in TableViewRow Lollipop devices

comments.body: Hello, The issue is resolved with SDK 5.0.2.GA. Thanks.
